original_text: They shall walk after the Lord: he shall roar like a lion: when he shall roar, then the children shall tremble from the west.
korean_text: 그들은 사자처럼 소리를 내시는 여호와를 따를 것이라 여호와께서 소리를 내시면 자손들이 서쪽에서부터 떨며 오되

sentences.original_text: They shall walk after the Lord
he shall roar like a lion
then children shall tremble from the west
